doc:
Kia Goodwin https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kia_Goodwin 0 Kia Joy Goodwin (born August 2, 1974) is an American actress. She is best known for her childhood role as Tiffany Holloway, Rose Holloway's (played by Alaina Reed Hall) daughter on the NBC comedy sitcom 227 for two seasons (1985-1987). Kia_Joy_Goodwin ( born August_2_,_1974 ) is an_American_actress .
